name: A Walk In The Woods (itch)
description:
"You're walking in the forest. You don't know particularly why you're here, but it's a nice enough day, so that aspect of this stroll doesn't quite bother you."

You play as an unnamed protagonist who finds themselves walking in a forest. The forest is a large and dangerous place. It is up to you (the player) to choose where to explore and what to do. Be careful though, as many of your choices may end in death.

R 18+

Trigger Warnings:

  • Warning for blood.
  • Explicit descriptions of death.
  • Stabbing
  • Eaten by a wolf
  • Drowning

A short visual novel. Has elements of horror and surrealism. Absolutely free to play.
